folder: Richmond Road & Altamount Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
Richmond Road, north side, west of Altamount Street. Shown is the Boy Scout Cabin and ruins, situated, according to P. L. perr, southwest of the Moravian -emetery. The Richmond Road desipnation is an approximate location, the writer of these lines being unable to determine, with uncuestionable accuracy, the exact site of the cabin.
View 1: January 10, 1924
View 2: March 27, 1924
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr

folder: Richmond Road & Altamount Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
Richmond Road, west side, south from Altamount Street, showing the New Dorp Park reserved residential real estate development.
May 6, 1926
P. L. Sperr
